skeletons.errorPersistInformation: If this persists, please check that CocktailBerry is running and you are in the same network!

skeletons.gettingConfigurationDescription: Fetching data from backend for setup, this should be quick ...

lockScreen.paymentMessage: Please put your card/chip to the scanner to access cocktails.

payment.holdCard: Hold your NFC card or tag near the reader to complete the payment
payment.scanNFCToAccess: Please scan your NFC card to access cocktails
payment.userNotFound: This NFC or card is not registered. Please register it or contact the owner.
payment.serviceUnavailable: Payment service is currently unavailable. Please contact the owner.

calibration.ingredientCalibrationTooltip: This will not change the pump settings, but multiply the volume flow at which the ingredient will be pumped during preparation.

password.passwordProtectedBy: This section is protected by the {{passwordName}} password.

issues.info: This issues are shown once after your backend was started and found this issues. You can dismiss them, they will not show again until a restart. It is still recommended to take care of them.
issues.systemPythonDeprecated: You System is using an older version of Python than needed in the future. You will not be able to do updates.
issues.noInternetConnection: You seem to have no internet connection, this will result in wrong time. Since you have the microservice activated, please consider adjusting time manually, otherwise send data is faulty!
issues.configSetToDefault: The faulty config was set the the default, please adjust it:

timeManager.adjustTimeConfirmation: Do you want to adjust system time to given data?

recipeCalculation.title: Recipe Calculator
recipeCalculation.confirmCalculation: This might take a while on large databases. Proceed?

restrictedMode.title: Restricted Mode
restrictedMode.message: Do you want to enable restricted mode? Only the cocktail maker will be accessible. You can still access configuration with the master password.
